content: Oh Oh
okay for today's project I have something interesting and the might

actually once you can use that to your advantage in certain projects but this
one you don't want to dissolve the whole thing away before you paint it so this
is definitely the best way the spray paint can't get in all the cracks either
so I would definitely paint them by hand it's a little more time-consuming but it

putting it on the tile and not the pieces themselves is the glue tends to
